long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Everyday millions people around world searching for 'Something near me' on Google, like:

- bicycle shop near me
- coffee shop near me
- phone case near me
- tourist places near me
...

And Google will display different search results content based on the user's location. If you base in New York, and your customs living in Berlin, for example, you will never know what your clients see when they do a search on Google, Especially when they use less commonly spoken languages for their searches, such as Spanish or German. The search result page they meet is very different with yours. 

Now, Search From will resolve this issue, with the extension, you can see search results from any country, language, or city around the world, just like a local resident would see. You can gain a better understanding of local users and competitors as if you were there. It's can help 
do a better SEO job, and gain more business.

It's very easy to use:
1️⃣ Open it
2️⃣ Enter the COUNTRY, LANGUAGE, CITY, and KEYWORDS you want to search for
3️⃣ Click the Search button or press Enter

This is a Chrome extension designed to provide a preview of global Google search results. By selecting a country, language, and geographic location of interest, you can see the Google search result pages as they would appear in those specific conditions, gaining insights into information landscapes in different geographic and cultural contexts. This extension supports localized search results from 246 countries and in 51 languages.

Here are some potential users and use cases for this extension:

- Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Experts: They can utilize this tool to examine Google search result pages across different geographic locations, optimizing their SEO strategies accordingly.

- Cross-border or Global Business Professionals: They can evaluate their performance and competition in specific countries and language markets more effectively.

- Travelers and Explorers: Before visiting a new country or city, users can leverage this extension to gain local insights, aiding in trip preparation and cultural understanding.

- International Journalists and Analysts: They can use this extension to view search results across different countries and regions, thus attaining a more comprehensive view of news and information.

- International Marketers and Advertisers: They can observe how their products or services rank in different areas, helping them optimize advertising strategies.

- Linguists and Students: They can examine search results in different languages, enhancing their understanding of information contexts across various linguistic environments.

- It's important to note that this extension operates entirely within your browser and does not collect personal data or make network requests to any servers. We respect your privacy and are committed to providing a secure tool for viewing global Google search results.
